column1: We taxpayers paid millions for this - a photo-op for @POTUS @VP. Meanwhile, 105,514 Americans are dead from the #coronavirus, our economy is devastated, 40,000,000 if us are unemployed, & #Trump is actively supporting white supremacists & neo-Nazis, hoping to stoke race riots.
